Pre-Game Insights: India are one of the only two teams in this World Cup who did not lose a game.Bangladesh's batting has been out of form, while India's batting is in good form.Bangladesh's bowlers have been performing well, but their batting struggles may cost them.India's strike bowlers are in tremendous form, picking up 18 wickets combined.Bangladesh's top order has been struggling, with the highest opening stand being 22.Virat Kohli is expected to have a big score against Bangladesh, where he averages 96.5.Jasprit Bumrah is crucial for India against Bangladesh's top order.Mustafizur Rahman and Litton Das are key players for Bangladesh against India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is part of the 2024 T20 World Cup's Super 8 stage.It's the 47th match of the tournament.The venue is Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in Antigua.India are strong favorites, but Bangladesh has a slender hope.
